mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_bust_prize( promotionId, vendorId, startTime, endTime, prize1, prize2, prize3, prize4, prize5, prize6, odds1, odds2, odds3, odds4, odds5, odds6 ) VALUES ( #{promotionId}, #{vendorId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{prize1}, #{prize2}, #{prize3}, #{prize4}, #{prize5}, #{prize6}, #{odds1}, #{odds2}, #{odds3}, #{odds4}, #{odds5}, #{odds6} )
mapper.select: SELECT id,prize1, prize2, prize3, prize4, prize5, prize6, odds1, odds2, odds3, odds4, odds5, odds6 FROM t_bust_prize WHERE vendorid = #{vendorId} and promotionid = #{promotionId}
